data.name: Before_You_Start_Text
data.value: Before you start

data.name: Collapsable_Awarding_Organisation_Roles
data.value: Awarding organisation roles

data.name: Collapsable_Provider_Roles
data.value: Provider roles

data.name: Heading_AwardingOrganisation_Can_Use_Service_To
data.value: Awarding organisations (also known as exam boards) can use this service to:

data.name: Heading_Provider_Can_Use_Service_To
data.value: Providers (for example, schools and colleges) can use this service to:

data.name: Learner_Records_Editors_Role
data.value: Learner records editors

data.name: Learner_Records_Editors_Role_Info
data.value: can upload, amend, view, delete and add English and maths achievements and update industry placement completion status

data.name: Link_Tlevel_Results_UserGuide
data.value: Manage T Level results user guide

data.name: Page_Heading
data.value: Manage T Level results

data.name: Page_Title
data.value: Manage T Level results

data.name: Para_For_Security_Reasons_You_Should_Always_Signout
data.value: For security reasons you should always sign out when you have finished using the service. Select ‘Sign out’ in the top right-hand corner of the screen to sign out and return to the 'Start' page.

data.name: Para_Manage_TLevel_Results_Is_Run_By
data.value: Manage T Level results is run by the Education and Skills Funding Agency (ESFA), an executive agency of the Department for Education (DfE).

data.name: Para_This_Service_IsFor
data.value: This service is for awarding organisations and providers who deliver T Level qualifications.

data.name: Para_User_Can_Be_Given_More_Than_One_Role
data.value: A user can be given more than one role. More details on the roles in this service can be read below.

data.name: Para_You_Will_Be_Signed_Out
data.value: You will be signed out if you are inactive for 30 minutes.

data.name: Provider_Administrators_Role
data.value: Provider administrators

data.name: Provider_Administrators_Role_Info
data.value: have all the permissions of learner records editor and can add users and assign the above role to them

data.name: Role_Providers_Editors
data.value: Providers editors

data.name: Role_Providers_Editors_Info
data.value: can set up new providers and enter and update the T Levels each provider is offering

data.name: Role_Registrations_Editors
data.value: Registrations editors

data.name: Role_Registrations_Editors_Info
data.value: can upload, view, update, remove and add learner registrations and assessment entries

data.name: Role_Results_Editors
data.value: Results editors

data.name: Role_Results_Editors_Info
data.value: can upload, view, update, remove and add learners’ results

data.name: Role_Site_Administrators
data.value: Site administrators

data.name: Role_Site_Administrators_Info
data.value: have all the permissions of the above roles and can add users and assign the above roles to them

data.name: Role_TLevels_Reviewers
data.value: T Levels reviewers

data.name: Role_TLevels_Reviewers_Info
data.value: review T Level titles and confirm that details are correct and raise a query if they are incorrect

data.name: Service_Access_The
data.value: access the

data.name: Service_TellUs_About_Grade_Appeal
data.value: tell us about a grade appeal

data.name: Service_TellUs_Add_Update_Assessments
data.value: add or update assessment entries

data.name: Service_TellUs_Add_Update_Registrations
data.value: add or update learner registrations

data.name: Service_TellUs_Add_Update_Results
data.value: add or update core component results

data.name: Service_TellUs_English_And_Maths_Qualification
data.value: tell us if a learner has met the minimum standard for English and maths

data.name: Service_TellUs_IndustryPlacement_Status
data.value: tell us if a learner has completed their industry placement

data.name: Service_TellUs_Provider_Offering
data.value: tell us which T Levels each provider is offering

data.name: Service_TellUs_Tlevel_Details_Correct
data.value: tell us if T Level details are correct

data.name: Start_Button_Text
data.value: Start now

data.name: You_Need_DfE_SignIn_Account_To_Use_This_Service_Text
data.value: You will need a DfE Sign in account and an assigned role.
